text: Nandao nimen shuoguo yi bo la xin, yi sima yi, yi si ha ge, ye er gu bai he ge zhipai, dou shi youtai jiaotu, huo jidu jiaotu ma? Ni shuo: Nimen geng you zhishi ne? Haishi zhenzhu geng you zhishi ne? Ziji shouzhong you cong zhenzhu jiang shi de zhengju, er jiayi yinhui de ren, you shei bi ta hai bu yi ne? Zhenzhu jue bu hushi nimen de xingwei.
